details: Schematics ITS 2024 is an annual event held by Schematics ITS. This event is a place for students to showcase their projects and compete with each other. This year's theme is 'Innovative Technology for a Better Future'.

Hacktoberfest is an annual event held by DigitalOcean. This event is a month-long celebration of open-source software. Participants are required to make 4 pull requests to any public repository on GitHub to get a limited edition T-shirt.

Google I/O is an annual developer conference held by Google. This event is a place for developers to learn about Google's latest products and technologies. This year's event will be held online due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
